reviews.text: I purchased carpet from Carpet Depot’s Decatur location for my man-cave project. Suzette Elder was as my salesperson and she took excellent care of me. Patiently answered all my questions and helped me make the perfect selection for needs. The installation process was flawless and professionally done. I would recommend Carpet Depot Decatur to anyone in the market for quality carpet at a competitive price.

The lady who assisted us was so patient and so informative. She was so happy to help and actually gave wonderful suggestions. Honestly I was scared because we initially were looking for an area rug and I happened to figure out that their catalog consists of actual carpet material. I was scared thinking the material would be off putting in our living room area but it actually looks so homey and comfortable. The price was beyond affordable compared to ordering an actual area rug or even going to buy one. I enjoyed this experience so much and certainly will be back should I need any further assistance! Thank you Carpet Depot!

First, it was really nice to meet Ms. Anna.
She was very informative, helpful, and proactive throughout this entire process.
My wife and I got all of our carpet installed and Anna always did a follow up call to make sure we had a great experience and was pleased with the product.

Thank you.

Carpet Depot and Suzette set the bar in flooring, customer service and prices that are so reasonable I didn't have to haggle AT ALL. It's rare these days not to walk away from big transactions where you don't feel like you have overpaid or been screwed over somehow. My experience with this business has offered nothing but reason after reason to give my future business to them. Thanks Suzette and Carpet Depot!
The professional care from Anna was great as a sales person and the staff were very knowledgeable. The installation was very thorough and detailed..!  Thanks again.  William
